name: Novusport: Awaken the Olympian Within!
blurb: Novusport is an entertainment, social media video game & interactive concept in competitive sports where YOU are part of the game.

rewards.reward: Olympian Fan - You will be favored by the Olympian Gods and Goddesses. Every dollar helps, and we\u2019ll never forget your name.

Enter the Gates of Olympus - Exclusive access to our pre-launch private discussion groups. \r\nSubmit ideas to our "Dream Team" about ways to make the app even more fun and exciting for our users.  Your input will help us decide which new ActivRs to be introduced in upcoming releases. \r\nYou also will get a Novus-Postcard signed by our "Dream Team." (Add $2.00 for international mailing).
Hermes Pal \u2013 Help spread the message.  Proudly wear the Novusport Kickstarter Edition Wristband -- PLUS all of the above.

Athena's Advisor \u2013 Participate in the Limited Private Beta and become a Novusport Advisor. Interact with our development team and help us build an application that will make history. \r\nYou will get access to all project updates, and a shout out in our Kickstarter Founder\u2019s Hall of Fame -- PLUS all of the above.

Ares' Army \u2013 Be one of the first official weekend warriors.  Get a "Premiere Novusport Account" for a full season that offers unlimited ActivRs and members-only functionality -- PLUS all of the above.

Shine Like Apollo \u2013 Wear your "Novusport Armor" shirt with pride. Make a bold statement, \u201cDon\u2019t Friend Me, Don\u2019t Like Me, Don\u2019t Follow Me, Don\u2019t Tweet Me, Challenge Me, Novusport! (shipped for free in the US. Please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping) -- PLUS all of the above.

Be as Timeless as Chronos -  Become a part of Novusport history.  We'll add your name and a photo of you performing your favorite sport to our Facebook Timeline, showing your zeal for the most exciting and innovative sports arena since the original Greek Olympic Games.  -- PLUS all of the above. http://Facebook.com/Novusport.

Shuffling with Demeter - Be the envy of your friends by wearing the coolest shirt in town and dressing up your iPhone with our limited edition protective case. Get ready to perform your ActivRs in full gear (shipped for free in the US; please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping) -- PLUS all of the above.

Inspired by Aphrodite - Show your love for the games. Leave a personal stamp on Novusport. Be the voice and face of the "Novusport Code of Honesty" by starring in our featured video.  This pledge is reserved for those who are passionate about sportsmanship. Be the first to set the standard for our users.  This is the Code: \u201cI pledge to perform my own ActivRs and to excel to the best of my abilities while upholding the rules set for each ActivR.  I promise not to cheat or lie about distances, times or any unit of measurement required to earn points and achievements, nor will I help fellow athletes to violate the Novusport Code of Honesty.\u201d Memorize it, feel it, deliver it. (shipped for free in the US. Please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping ) -- PLUS all of the above.

Party like Dionysus \u2013 Two VIP tickets to our launch Party! Seriously, we don't plan on sleeping.  Be part of our "Dream Team" for a day as we carry the torch.  Come celebrate with us inside the velvet ropes and together light the flame to signal the inauguration of the new Novusport games.  You don't want to miss this opportunity. Reserved only for shufflers! (PLUS all of the above and shipping is free in the US. Please add an additional $10 to your pledge for international shipping.) Excludes the $500.00 pledge incentive. RSVP required when event date is set.

Challenge Hercules \u2013 Go face to face against our ActivR demigod, Franky Easton. He will teach you and the world how to play the coolest sports/social media game. Be part of the production of a training video to be featured on your chosen Novusport main sports page (PLUS all of the above) Excludes the $500.00 pledge incentive.

Capture Poseidon\u2019s Trident - Challenge the founders Hugo Aguilar and Daniel Iturbe to a weekend competition to win the first exclusive Founder\u2019s Trophy. Have the chance to lay your hands on this coveted prize.  Dare to enter Poseidon's Realm? (Dinner and travel included in the continental US -- PLUS all of the above. Exclusions apply.)

Catch Zeus\u2019 Thunderbolt -  Be the god of neighborhood courts and compare your physical attributes to a former basketball first-round draft pick who played 11 seasons in the NBA.  You and Mo Taylor will compete in the first \u201cNovusport Meets Joe\u201d series where our Novusport users will challenge professional athletes in various sports.  See it live on our Web series pilot "Novusport Center", for the best of our videos from around the world. You will also receive a Special Edition Novusport \u201dZeus Shirt\u201d (Dinner and travel included in the continental US -- PLUS all of the above. Exclusions apply.)

Titans Revenge \u2013 (Corporate Pledge) \u2013 Reach all our Olympians in titanic proportions.  Be part of Novusport world by showcasing your company's logo on our website and in our how-to instructional videos for a period of 6 months. (Excluded: $500, $2,500, $7,500 and $10,000 pledge incentives. Please Contact us for more information.)
